materials.raw_text: C: 5.2 g, Ga: 12.3 g, Zr: 10.5 g, C2: 2.6 g (Total approx. 30 g for a solid sample)

sourcing.instructions: C (Carbon): Chemical supply stores; Ga (Gallium): Metal suppliers; Zr (Zirconium): Metal suppliers
steps: C (Carbon): Chemical supply stores; Ga (Gallium): Metal suppliers; Zr (Zirconium): Metal suppliers
1. Weigh all ingredients accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh all ingredients accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 1200°C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 1200°C.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Remove the cooled crucible from the furnace.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the cooled crucible from the furnace.
